Tucson looks to Legacy with eyes slightly narrowed.  It was a look of sligh=
t annoyance and the fact that Uproar could have been treated long before hi=
s symptoms got worse.  Yet he keeps an even demeanor.

" Legacy, i would ha=
ve wanted to know about this sooner...  Uproar's condition has grown worse =
and so far he has not seen treatment when we obviously have the means to tr=
eat him..  Well, that's over now, but I want him treated now, and then you =
can do the same for me.  I want no delays and no excuses.  Do I make myself=
 clear?"

Rattrap nods as he goes to join Windlord.

" Right on it boss.  Y=
ou can count on us.  By the way, be careful around Wings, he's kinda look'n=
 like he's ready ta give someone the business."

Quickstride raises his han=
d.

" I got a question.  Legacy says he knows how ta cure Energon Dispersal=
 syndrome.  Howcome he hasn't helped Uproar yet and why hasn't anyone notic=
ed that ?  I mean he's one of us too, we should worry about him."

Nightshi=
ft nods in agreement.

" Yeah what he said, and what about Cheetor, Rhinox =
and Optimus Primal?  We cant leave until we find them."
